home.subtext: Join your crew or captain a new voyage.
home.identify: Take a Photo & Enter Your Name

identify.title: Identify Yourself
identify.subtitle: Every sailor needs a name and a face before boarding.

join.title: Enter Ship Code
join.invalidCode: Please enter a valid ship code (at least 4 characters).

roleSelection.title: Choose Your Role
roleSelection.instruction: Select the role you want to play this game. Once confirmed, your role cannot be changed.
roleSelection.warning: This cannot be changed once confirmed!

profile.cameraDenied: Camera access denied. You can continue without a photo.
profile.photoRequired: Please take a photo to continue.

lobby.title: Ship Crew
lobby.autoDesc: Roles are automatically assigned when the voyage begins.
lobby.manualDesc: Players will select their own roles when the voyage begins.
lobby.minPlayers: Need at least {{min}} sailors to depart!

roles.SAILOR_DESC: Steer the ship to blue area.
roles.PIRATE_DESC: Steer the ship to red area.
roles.CULT_LEADER_DESC: Steer the ship to yellow area or get eaten by Kraken.
roles.CULTIST_DESC: Steer the ship to yellow area or feed the Cult Leader to the Kraken.

game.eliminatedDesc: You have been thrown overboard or fed to the Kraken. Your journey ends here.
game.endSessionDesc: Are you sure you want to leave the game? You won't be able to rejoin with the same role.
game.resetGameDesc: This will revert the game to the start of the voyage. All actions (Cabin Searches, Floggings, Conversions) will be undone. Roles will remain the same.
game.backToLobbyDesc: This will completely reset the game state and return everyone to the lobby. Roles will be cleared and the voyage will end.

feedTheKraken.title: Feed The Kraken
feedTheKraken.selectVictim: Select a victim to feed to the Kraken
feedTheKraken.confirmation: Are you sure you want to feed {{name}} to the Kraken?
feedTheKraken.result: {{name}} has been fed to the Kraken!
feedTheKraken.request: has chosen to feed you to the Kraken. Do you accept your fate?
feedTheKraken.cultWinsDesc: The Cult Leader was fed to the Kraken! The Cult Leader and all Cultists immediately win the game.

flogging.title: Flogging
flogging.selectTarget: Select a crew member to flog
flogging.punishmentRequest: The sailor must accept their punishment...
flogging.alreadyUsed: Flogging has already been used this game.
flogging.request: wants to flog you. Do you accept your punishment?

cabinSearch.title: Cabin Search
cabinSearch.alreadyClaimed: This role is already claimed by someone else.
cabinSearch.revealedToLeader: The Cult Leader has seen your identity.
cabinSearch.request: wants to search your cabin. Do you allow it?
cabinSearch.waitingConfirmationDesc: The crewmate must allow the search...
cabinSearch.searchedDesc: Press and hold to reveal the loyalty card.

conversion.title: Conversion
conversion.selectTarget: Select a crew member to convert
conversion.success: {{name}} has been converted to the cult!
conversion.correctDesc: You have proven your worth to the Great Old One.
conversion.wrongDesc: The Kraken is displeased with your ignorance.
conversion.nowCultist: You are now a Cultist. Serve the Cult Leader.
conversion.joinedRanks: Has joined your ranks as a Cultist.
conversion.proveWorthDesc: Answer correctly to please the Kraken.
conversion.ritualBegun: A ritual has begun. All players must accept to proceed.
conversion.limitReached: The conversion ritual can only be performed 3 times per game.
conversion.alreadyAccepted: You have already accepted the ritual.

offWithTongue.title: Off With The Tongue
offWithTongue.selectTarget: Select a crew member to silence
offWithTongue.requestDesc: If you accept, you can no longer articulate words (but can make sounds and gesticulate) and can no longer become captain.

cultGunsStash.title: Cult's Gun Stash
cultGunsStash.noGuns: You did not receive any guns from the stash.

roleReveal.instruction: Press and hold to reveal your role.

errors.cabinSearchDenied: The player denied the cabin search.
errors.feedTheKrakenDenied: The player refused to be fed to the Kraken.
errors.offWithTongueDenied: The player refused to be silenced.
errors.invalidRoleDistribution: Invalid role distribution: Must have exactly one Captain, one Navigator, and one Lieutenant.
errors.silencedCannotClaimCaptain: You cannot claim Captain because you have been silenced.
errors.captainCannotFeedSelf: The captain cannot feed themselves to the Kraken.
errors.playerAlreadySilenced: This player has already lost their tongue.
errors.onlyHostCanChangeMode: Only the host can change role distribution mode.
errors.cannotChangeModeAfterStart: Cannot change mode after the game has started.
errors.alreadyConfirmedRole: You have already confirmed your role selection.
errors.roleNotAvailableForCount: This role is not available for this player count.
errors.floggingAlreadyUsed: Flogging has already been used this game.

denial.title: Denial of Command
denial.description: This action is irreversible. You will be eliminated from the game.

quiz.q0_question: What is the primary diet of the Kraken?
quiz.q3_question: What does 'Davy Jones' Locker' refer to?
quiz.q4_question: Which of these is NOT a type of ship?
quiz.q6_question: Who is the captain of the Flying Dutchman?
